attributes.action: Pay jobseekers if they are to be used as forced-labour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are now hearing that jobseekers claiming benefits will be made to work for their money, this is a great idea and one that only lazy and thus non-eligible people will object to, however we call on the prime minister to make sure that people submitted to such a forced-labour scheme be paid the minimum wage for the hours they work and not the measly level of welfare currently provided, or if the work is there for jobseekers to do in the first place, offer it to them as their full time employment.
This petition has been reviewed by many people before submission and is clear in what it sets out to achieve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
